Package tage

Class HUDmanager

java.lang.Object
tage.HUDmanager
public class HUDmanager extends Object
Manages up to two HUD strings, implemented as GLUT strings. This class is instantiated automatically by the engine. Note that this class utilizes deprectated OpenGL functionality.

The available fonts are:

  • GLUT.BITMAP_8_BY_13
  • GLUT.BITMAP_9_BY_15
  • GLUT.BITMAP_TIMES_ROMAN_10
  • GLUT.BITMAP_TIMES_ROMAN_24
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_10
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_12
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_18

This class includes a "kludge". On many systems, GLUT strings ignore the glColor setting and uses the most recent color rendered. Therefore, this HUD renderer first renders a single pixel at the desired HUD color at a distant location, before drawing the HUD.

Author:
Scott Gordon
